name: BaseballMan vs Zombie
description:
Team : 

                  - Snippeeey , Promgramming 

                  - Justine_Guerin ,3D & Texturing

                  - Noémie_Folio, 3D

                   - Yanis , VFX & Animation

As the part of the Jam Arcade that taken place in my school the game is a short game thath is playable with a controller 

In order to control the player use the stick to orientate the player to aim the zombies and press any of the four right button to shoot the ball or hit it to increase his speed and power

Kill them all and increase your score
